properties.description: Posted by Knowlengr 48 Main Street Port Washington NY 11050Ginos Pizzeria 48 Main St Port Washington, NY 11050 (516) 944-0276‎ Family oriented, can be noisy, quality. Pizza is perhaps the most popular in Port Washington, which has half a dozen pizzerias. Other Italian food on the menu is also satisfactory.

properties.name: Shish-Kebab Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Knowlengr 283 Main St Port Washington NY 11050 516-883-9309 One of the best Mediterranean restaurants in Long Island. Extensive menu, satisfactory service. Large seating area. See also their more casual restaurant a couple of doors down. Walk to the harbor from this restaurant. It\'s quite a few several blocks from the train station, but a good way to work up an appetite if you have the time.
